ygData.subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm I do not think the recently deceased Human who is bumping around in the dark would agree with you here...  Also people with dark video equipment
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?
>Date: Fri, 18 Feb 2000 09:01:08 -0500
>
>Can't say that I have ever groupped with anybody that said...
>
>"...my god kerouac - thank god your here... please play that see invis song
>please"
>or
>"...wow, never knew bards could sing a so I could see invis - cool"
>
>Don't most casters get see invis WAY before lvl 24? And most humans have
>found a way to deal with the night vision by lvl 24,
>unless there is a recent death involved... That's what I mean when I say
>useless...
>

Hmmm I do not think the recently deceased Human who is bumping around in the
dark would agree with you here... Also people with dark video equipment
(graphics card and/or monitor) find this useful as well.

>There is no doubt alot of our songs are specialized, like the psalm >series
>and such... but, there are about 6 uselss - they are TOO specialized.
>
>MMM,
In Dueling and PvP this song is great. Also handy to quickly get down from
very high places without dying.

>Disenchanting,
This song is useless so 1 point for you. :p

>Identify
Try to complete the Lambent armor quests without this one. Also i have a
feeling that many more quests will have items in the future that need to be
identified.

>jump right to mind, am I to toss the lvl 24
>song into that same heap now? Can they be used, yes... are they
>useful - I have not found them useful.
>
Just because you find something useless does not mean the rest of us do. I
know of people that even find Disenchanting Melody useful. Usually in a
Melee heavy group without a buffer from what I have heard.

>I just think that if Verant is gonna limit our songs to 50, and then
>not really implement 50... that there shouldn't be that many lemons...
>
>Kerouac Dharmabum
>lvl 34
>Rodcent Nife


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
